title: Launch of Bulwark Foundation
excerpt: We announce the start of the foundation's activities to provide legal and psychological support to Belarusian volunteers...
content:
Systemic Support

The Bulwark Foundation was established to assist Belarusians who participated in the defense of Ukraine and found themselves in a vulnerable position due to lack of stable legal status and forced emigration.

Our Focus

  • Free legal consultations on legalization.
  • Psychological assistance for overcoming traumatic experiences.
  • Human rights advocacy to protect beneficiaries' rights.

Our goal is to ensure a dignified and secure future for those who risked their lives for freedom.

title: Official Social Media Launch
excerpt: Bulwark is now available on Telegram, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn for closer communication...
content:
Let's Stay Connected

We have opened official pages on popular social networks. This will allow us to be closer to our beneficiaries and the community.

What will you find on our channels?

  • Operating news about the foundation's activities.
  • Explanations of complex legal procedures.
  • Stories and opportunities for support.
  • Updates for volunteers and their families.

title: Bulwark Platform Launch: A New Stage of Support
excerpt: We are officially launching a unified information resource to help Belarusian volunteers. Transparency, a knowledge base, and systemic support â€” all in one place.
content:
Our Mission Features For Partners For Volunteers

Our Mission

Bulwark is the answer to the demand for systemic support. We have created a platform that doesn't just collect donations but builds a bridge between those who help and those on the front line.

Main Goal: Maximum resource efficiency and legal safety for every fighter.

What Does the Platform Provide?

  • Knowledge Base: Detailed instructions on legalization in Ukraine, obtaining statuses, and documents.
  • Accountability: Regular publications on the targeted use of funds.
  • Fast Contact: A direct channel for volunteer inquiries.

title: Update of the 'Materials' Section
excerpt: We have prepared new instructions on legalization and document recovery...
content:
Knowledge is Protection

The 'Materials' section on our website has been significantly expanded. We have gathered up-to-date information to help avoid legal traps.

New Topics:

  • Detailed guides on legalization in Ukraine.
  • Procedures for recovering lost documents.
  • Analysis of deportation risks and methods of legal defense.

We recommend reviewing these materials before submitting any documents to state authorities.

title: Join the Team: Looking for Volunteers
excerpt: Join the support for Belarusian volunteers. We need your help in communication and project organization...
content:
Become a Part of Bulwark

Our foundation is looking for volunteers ready to donate their time and talent for a common cause. Your help will allow us to reach more beneficiaries.

Where is Help Needed?

  • Communication with volunteers and their families.
  • Organization of events and humanitarian meetings.
  • Preparation of information and design materials.
  • Administrative project support.

If you want to contribute to the protection of human dignity, write to us via the contact form on the website.

title: Call for Expert Cooperation
excerpt: We invite lawyers, psychologists, and human rights specialists to join our programs...
content:
Expert Support

We invite experts in the fields of law, psychology, social work, and mediation for cooperation. Your expertise is the key to systemic solutions.

What we offer experts:

  • Participation in the preparation of analytical materials.
  • Consultations for the foundation's beneficiaries.
  • Development of legal defense strategies at the state level.

If you are ready to share your experience and knowledge, please contact us to discuss the format of cooperation.
